competition_summary.context: Competition 23 Human Capital 24 Sustainability and Corporate Responsibility 25 Regulatory and Compliance Matters 26 Available Information 32 Overview Founded in 1990, Apollo is a high-growth, global alternative asset manager and a retirement services provider.
